io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.HelmRelease.description: HelmRelease is the Schema for the helmreleases API.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.HelmReleaseSpe.description: HelmReleaseSpec defines the desired state of a Helm release.

chart.description: Chart defines the template of the v1.HelmChart that should be created for this HelmRelease.

interval.description: Interval at which to reconcile the Helm release.

timeout.description: Timeout is the time to wait for any individual Kubernetes operation during the performance of a Helm action. Defaults to HelmReleaseSpec.Interval duration.

releaseName.description: ReleaseName used for the Helm release. Defaults to a composition of '[TargetNamespace-]Name'.

targetNamespace.description: TargetNamespace to target when performing operations for the HelmRelease. Defaults to the namespace of the HelmRelease.

storageNamespace.description: StorageNamespace used for the Helm storage. Defaults to the namespace of the HelmRelease.

suspend.description: Suspend tells the controller to suspend reconciliation for this HelmRelease.

maxHistory.description: MaxHistory is the number of revisions saved by Helm for this HelmRelease. Use 0 for an unlimited number of revisions; defaults to 5.

values.description: Values holds the values for this Helm release.

valuesFrom.description: ValuesFrom holds references to resources containing Helm values for this HelmRelease.

install.description: Install holds the configuration for Helm install actions for this HelmRelease.

upgrade.description: Upgrade holds the configuration for Helm upgrade actions for this HelmRelease.

rollback.description: Rollback holds the configuration for Helm rollback actions for this HelmRelease.

dependsOn.description: DependsOn may contain a meta.NamespacedObjectReference slice with references to HelmRelease resources that must be ready before this HelmRelease can be reconciled.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.HelmChartTempl.description: HelmChartTemplate defines the template from which the controller will generate a v1.HelmChart object in the same namespace as the referenced v1.Source.

spec.description: Spec holds the template for the v1.HelmChartSpec for this HelmRelease.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.HelmChartTempl.description: HelmChartTemplateSpec defines the template from which the controller will generate a v1.HelmChartSpec object.

chart.description: The name or path the Helm chart is available at in the SourceRef.

version.description: Version semver expression, ignored for charts from v1.GitRepository and v1beta2.Bucket sources. Defaults to latest when omitted.

sourceRef.description: The name and namespace of the v1.Source the chart is available at.

interval.description: Interval at which to check the v1.Source for updates. Defaults to HelmReleaseSpec.Interval.

valuesFiles.description: Alternative list of values files to use as the chart values.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.CrossNamespace.description: CrossNamespaceSourceReference contains enough information to locate the typed Kubernetes resource at cluster level.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.ValuesReferenc.description: ValuesReference contains a reference to a resource containing Helm values, and optionally the key they can be found at.

kind.description: Kind of the values referent, valid values are ConfigMap or Secret.

name.description: Name of the values referent. The valuesKey is a required field.

valuesKey.description: ValuesKey is the data key where the values.yaml or a specific value can be found at. Defaults to values.yaml.

targetPath.description: TargetPath is the YAML dot notation path at which the value should be merged.

optional.description: Optional indicates whether the referenced resource must exist, or whether to tolerate its absence.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.Install.description: Install holds the configuration for Helm install actions performed for this HelmRelease.

crds.description: CRDs upgrade CRDs from the Helm Chart's crds directory according to the CRD upgrade policy.

createNamespace.description: CreateNamespace tells the Helm install action to create the HelmReleaseSpec.TargetNamespace if it does not exist yet.

disableWait.description: DisableWait disables the waiting for resources to be ready after a Helm install has been performed.

remediation.description: Remediation holds the remediation configuration for when the Helm install action for the HelmRelease fails.

timeout.description: Timeout is the time to wait for any individual Kubernetes operation during the performance of a Helm install action. Defaults to HelmReleaseSpec.Timeout.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.InstallRemedia.description: InstallRemediation holds the configuration for Helm install remediation.

retries.description: Retries is the number of retries that should be attempted on failures before bailing.

ignoreTestFailures.description: IgnoreTestFailures tells the controller to skip remediation when the Helm tests are run after an install action but fail.

remediateLastFailure.description: RemediateLastFailure tells the controller to remediate the last failure, when no retries remain.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.Upgrade.description: Upgrade holds the configuration for Helm upgrade actions performed for this HelmRelease.

crds.description: CRDs upgrade CRDs from the Helm Chart's crds directory according to the CRD upgrade policy.

cleanupOnFail.description: CleanupOnFail allows deletion of new resources created during the Helm upgrade action when it fails.

disableWait.description: DisableWait disables the waiting for resources to be ready after a Helm upgrade has been performed.

force.description: Force forces resource updates through a replacement strategy.

remediation.description: Remediation holds the remediation configuration for when the Helm upgrade action for the HelmRelease fails.

timeout.description: Timeout is the time to wait for any individual Kubernetes operation during the performance of a Helm upgrade action. Defaults to HelmReleaseSpec.Timeout.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.UpgradeRemedia.description: UpgradeRemediation holds the configuration for Helm upgrade remediation.

retries.description: Retries is the number of retries that should be attempted on failures before bailing.

ignoreTestFailures.description: IgnoreTestFailures tells the controller to skip remediation when the Helm tests are run after an upgrade action but fail.

remediateLastFailure.description: RemediateLastFailure tells the controller to remediate the last failure, when no retries remain.

strategy.description: Strategy to use for failure remediation.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.Rollback.description: Rollback holds the configuration for Helm rollback actions for this HelmRelease.

cleanupOnFail.description: CleanupOnFail allows deletion of new resources created during the Helm rollback action when it fails.

disableWait.description: DisableWait disables the waiting for resources to be ready after a Helm rollback has been performed.

force.description: Force forces resource updates through a replacement strategy.

recreate.description: Recreate performs pod restarts for the resource if applicable.

timeout.description: Timeout is the time to wait for any individual Kubernetes operation during the performance of a Helm rollback action. Defaults to HelmReleaseSpec.Timeout.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.NamespacedObje.description: NamespacedObjectReference contains enough information to locate the referenced Kubernetes resource object in any namespace.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.HelmReleaseSta.description: HelmReleaseStatus defines the observed state of a HelmRelease.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the last observed generation.

conditions.description: Conditions holds the conditions for the HelmRelease.

helmChart.description: HelmChart is the namespaced name of the HelmChart resource created by the controller for the HelmRelease.

lastAppliedRevision.description: LastAppliedRevision is the revision of the last successfully applied source.

lastAttemptedRevision.description: LastAttemptedRevision is the revision of the last reconciliation attempt.

lastHandledReconcileAt.description: LastHandledReconcileAt holds the value of the most recent reconcile request value.

installFailures.description: InstallFailures is the install failure count against the latest desired state.

upgradeFailures.description: UpgradeFailures is the upgrade failure count against the latest desired state.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.helm.v2.Condition.description: Condition contains details for one aspect of the current state of this API Resource.

reason.description: Reason contains a programmatic identifier indicating the reason for the condition's last transition.

message.description: Message is a human readable message indicating details about the transition.

lastTransitionTime.description: LastTransitionTime is the last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

io.k8s.apimachinery.pkg.apis.meta.v1.Obj.description: ObjectMeta is metadata that all persisted resources must have.

name.description: Name must be unique within a namespace.

namespace.description: Namespace defines the space within which each name must be unique.

labels.description: Map of string keys and values that can be used to organize and categorize objects.

annotations.description: Annotations is an unstructured key value map stored with a resource that may be set by external tools.
